signals.problem_statement: The customer needs a chatbot to handle simple inquiries to improve efficiency and reduce the time spent by the team on repetitive tasks.
signals.suggested_solution: Integration of an AI chatbot that can respond to FAQs and simple inquiries about order status and product information.
signals.context: Small team, looking to automate responses for customer inquiries on a Shopify platform.

signals.problem_statement: The customer is concerned about the complexity of setting up the AI chatbot to handle specific inquiries effectively.
signals.context: Wants to streamline responses for inquiries that currently take 5-10 minutes to address manually.

signals.problem_statement: The customer is looking for a way to ensure that the AI can learn from past communications to improve response accuracy without needing to upload snippets manually.
signals.context: Wants the AI to analyze all past communications for similar situations to enhance its learning and response capabilities.

signals.problem_statement: The customer wants to future-proof their operations by ensuring that AI can handle increasing volumes of communication as their business grows.
signals.context: Concerned about being behind in AI capabilities in the next two years.
